hooks.command: if [ -f package.json ] && grep -q '"typecheck"' package.json 2>/dev/null; then npm run typecheck --silent 2>/dev/null || true; fi
osascript -e 'display notification "Task completed" with title "Claude Code"'

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); short="${cwd/#$HOME/~}"; IFS='/' read -ra P <<< "$short"; [ ${#P[@]} -gt 3 ] && short="~/${P[-2]}/${P[-1]}"; git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if ! git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null; then st="±"; else st="✓"; fi; git_info=$(printf "\033[36m  %s \033[33m%s\033[0m" "$branch" "$st"); fi; usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); ctx=""; if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then cur=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); sz=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); if [ "$cur" != "null" ] && [ "$sz" != "null" ] && [ "$sz" -gt 0 ]; then pct=$((cur * 100 / sz)); [ $pct -lt 50 ] && col="\033[32m" || { [ $pct -lt 75 ] && col="\033[33m" || col="\033[31m"; }; ctx=$(printf " %s%d%%\033[0m" "$col" "$pct"); fi; fi; model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name' | sed 's/Claude //'); printf "\033[34m%s\033[0m%s \033[35m%s\033[0m%s" "$short" "$git_info" "$model" "$ctx"
